data.text: (…Woooooaaaaaaah!)
data.processed: <story>(…Woooooaaaaaaah!)

data.text: Bakushin, bakushin, bakushiiin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Bakushin, bakushin, bakushiiin!!

data.text:
Bakushin O is in the lead! 
Sakura Bakushin O is leading!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Bakushin O is in the lead! 
<story>Sakura Bakushin O is leading!

data.text: Onwaaaaards!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Onwaaaaards!!

data.text:
And she leads herself straight to first place!! 
Sakura Bakushin O is the Sprinters Stakes' new champion!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>And she leads herself straight to first place!! 
<story>Sakura Bakushin O is the Sprinters Stakes' new champion!

data.text: (Wooooaaaaahhh…)
data.processed: <story>(Wooooaaaaahhh…)

data.text: (chirp chirp)
data.processed: <story>(chirp chirp)

data.text:
Early morning. I'd gone to the training course and saw 
Sakura Bakushin O running. She seemed to be training on her own.
data.processed:
<story>Early morning. I'd gone to the training course and saw 
<story>Sakura Bakushin O running. She seemed to be training on her own.

data.text:
Uoooooohhhh! ! 
Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiiin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Uoooooohhhh! ! 
<story>Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiiin!!

data.text:
She ran even faster than in my dream. 
She really is the best sprinter I've ever seen…!
data.processed:
<story>She ran even faster than in my dream. 
<story>She really is the best sprinter I've ever seen…!

data.text:
On the other hand, it likely means she can't demonstrate her 
true abilities at distances that don't match her. However―
data.processed:
<story>On the other hand, it likely means she can't demonstrate her 
<story>true abilities at distances that don't match her. However―

data.text:
Haa… Hah… Fyaah～! That takes care of that for the day! 
Good job, class rep! You can do it if you try!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Haa… Hah… Fyaah～! That takes care of that for the day! 
<story>Good job, class rep! You can do it if you try!

data.text:
'scuse me, Ms. Sakura Bakushin O! 
How would you feel about ruling the sprint world with me?
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>'scuse me, Ms. Sakura Bakushin O! 
<story>How would you feel about ruling the sprint world with me?

data.text:
I appreciate your offer, and I'm sorry! 
I'm afraid I must decline!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I appreciate your offer, and I'm sorry! 
<story>I'm afraid I must decline!!

data.text: I am the shining example, the class president!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>I am the shining example, the class president!

data.text:
Sakura Bakushin O's will was firm. As a trainer, I want to 
respect her wishes, but I'm at a bit of a loss…
data.processed:
<story>Sakura Bakushin O's will was firm. As a trainer, I want to 
<story>respect her wishes, but I'm at a bit of a loss…

data.text:
In my brooding, the whole day had passed, 
and when I visited the track again…
data.processed:
<story>In my brooding, the whole day had passed, 
<story>and when I visited the track again…

data.text:
That is to say, you wish me, the class rep, to provide you 
a few running tips!! You wish for guidance! Isn't that right!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>That is to say, you wish me, the class rep, to provide you 
<story>a few running tips!! You wish for guidance! Isn't that right!?

data.text: Eh, eh…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Eh, eh…?

data.text:
Well, Rice was just t-talking to herself… 
saying "Ms. Bakushin O is so fast…"…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Well, Rice was just t-talking to herself… 
<story>saying "Ms. Bakushin O is so fast…"…

data.text:
There's no need to be shy!! I am the reliable class president!! 
You can rely on me! Go on! Go go!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>There's no need to be shy!! I am the reliable class president!! 
<story>You can rely on me! Go on! Go go!!

data.text:
Um, umm, but… if you spend too much time with Rice, bad 
things are bound to come to Ms. Bakushin O…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Um, umm, but… if you spend too much time with Rice, bad 
<story>things are bound to come to Ms. Bakushin O…

data.text: …You won't? Rely on me?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>…You won't? Rely on me?

data.text:
Is that so… 
You won't rely on the class president, I see…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Is that so… 
<story>You won't rely on the class president, I see…

data.text:
Not a single question…? 
I see…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Not a single question…? 
<story>I see…

data.text: H-Hawawa…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>H-Hawawa…

data.text: Umm… maybe Rice would like to know the trick to victory…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Umm… maybe Rice would like to know the trick to victory…?

data.text: I'm so glad you asked!!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>I'm so glad you asked!!!!

data.text: Fuhyaa!?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Fuhyaa!?

data.text:
The class president will teach you the secret to absolute 
victory! That is, of course — speed!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>The class president will teach you the secret to absolute 
<story>victory! That is, of course — speed!

data.text: S-Speed…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>S-Speed…

data.text:
Think about it, Ms. Rice. 
How do you win a race?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Think about it, Ms. Rice. 
<story>How do you win a race?

data.text:
By reaching the finish faster than anyone else!! 
Isn't that right!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>By reaching the finish faster than anyone else!! 
<story>Isn't that right!?

data.text: Y-Yes, you're right…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Y-Yes, you're right…

data.text:
In other words, speed is power! 
Running faster than anyone else! Any time, every time! 
Run in the lead, closer to the goal than anyone else!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>In other words, speed is power! 
<story>Running faster than anyone else! Any time, every time! 
<story>Run in the lead, closer to the goal than anyone else!!

data.text: Overwhelming speed is the key to victory!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Overwhelming speed is the key to victory!

data.text: I see…!?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>I see…!?

data.text:
… At first I thought she was talking nonsense. 
But—
data.processed:
<story>… At first I thought she was talking nonsense. 
<story>But—

data.text:
Her obsession with speed, her near absolute faith in it- 
It may just be what supports her explosive running.
data.processed:
<story>Her obsession with speed, her near absolute faith in it- 
<story>It may just be what supports her explosive running.

data.text:
Well, I did a good thing! 
Good class presidenting makes me feel great!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Well, I did a good thing! 
<story>Good class presidenting makes me feel great!

data.text:
……Huwahh!? 
You again!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>……Huwahh!? 
<story>You again!?

data.text:
Hmm…? 
Say, why are you staring at me in silence?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Hmm…? 
<story>Say, why are you staring at me in silence?

data.text:
"Surpass everyone with overwhelming speed". 
If we could push that as far as it will go…
data.processed:
<story>"Surpass everyone with overwhelming speed". 
<story>If we could push that as far as it will go…

data.text: Bakushin, bakushin, bakushiiin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Bakushin, bakushin, bakushiiin!!

data.text:
Bakushin O is in the lead! 
Sakura Bakushin O is leading!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Bakushin O is in the lead! 
<story>Sakura Bakushin O is leading!

data.text: Onwaaaards!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Onwaaaards!!

data.text: Maybe, possibly, just conceivably…!?
data.processed: <story>Maybe, possibly, just conceivably…!?

data.text:
Say? Say, say, say! 
Were you not looking for anything in particular…?!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Say? Say, say, say! 
<story>Were you not looking for anything in particular…?!

data.text:
All the trainers I spoke to after yesterday tried to 
lead me astray with talk of "giving up on long distances" 
and "aptitudes"…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>All the trainers I spoke to after yesterday tried to 
<story>lead me astray with talk of "giving up on long distances" 
<story>and "aptitudes"…

data.text: If you're like that, I can tell you I will refuse!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>If you're like that, I can tell you I will refuse!!

data.text: Yes?!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: We go for the pinnacle of speed together!
choices.processed: <size=40>We go for the pinnacle of speed together!</size>

data.processed: <story>Yes?!

data.text: P-pinnacle of speed…?!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>P-pinnacle of speed…?!

data.text:
Trainer, you mean… 
To command every race with speed!! Is that it!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Trainer, you mean… 
<story>To command every race with speed!! Is that it!?

data.text:
As class president!! Every race!! 
Is that what you're trying to do?!?!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>As class president!! Every race!! 
<story>Is that what you're trying to do?!?!

data.text:
Bakushiiiiin!! 
Those are the words I've been waiting for!! My trainer!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Bakushiiiiin!! 
<story>Those are the words I've been waiting for!! My trainer!!

data.text:
Starting tomorrow then, I'll be counting 
on you for guidance and encouragement!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Starting tomorrow then, I'll be counting 
<story>on you for guidance and encouragement!!

data.text: … This is how I succeeded in scouting Sakura Bakushin O.
data.processed: <story>… This is how I succeeded in scouting Sakura Bakushin O.
